group_1.textLeft: Trying to show off her power, but accidentally@giving us information instead...
If that's the case, we can't let it go to waste.
Let's crush as many troubles@as we can tonight!

group_1.textRight: So you're saying we should follow the magic@to find seeds that are sprouting?

group_1.textLeft: I have a feeling that if the seeds continue to@grow, nothing good would come out of it.

group_1.textRight: I concur.
I believe it would be best to deal with the@danger as soon as possible...
In that case, we need to hurry!
Let's solve the trouble and turn them back@into seeds!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! Let's go!
Phew...
I think this is the last of them in the@new school building.

group_1.textRight: There were a great number of small seeds...
The next largest amount were medium seeds,@and only a few were large...

group_1.textLeft: And, the small seeds...
Except for the ones that were handled by@the committee, all of them were sprouting.
And it was difficult to solve trouble where@there were flowers blooming...

group_1.textRight: It was aaalmost too late...

group_1.textLeft: When the flowers bloom...seeds are produced...
Does that mean it's "finished"?

group_1.textRight: Will the new seeds create new trouble...?
Is that why there are seeds of different sizes...?

group_1.textLeft: I feel like the bigger the seed...
The bigger the trouble...

group_1.textRight: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: Sayuki-senpai?!

group_1.textRight: Owww...I felllll...

group_1.textLeft: Are you okay?

group_1.textRight: I'm not injured...

group_1.textLeft: Did you trip on something...?

group_1.textRight: Nooope, I was just looking at the seeds and@my legs got all tangled...

group_1.textLeft: What about the seeds...?
Did you crush them when you fell over...?

group_1.textRight: [chara:303301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
O-oh no...! The clues...!
...Huh? The seeds are fine...
...Maybe the seeds can't be broken?

group_1.textLeft: Or perhaps a mere impact isn't enough@to break them...
Ordinary means are ineffective against@Witches as well...
...Then I wonder if magic would work...?

group_1.textRight: We could give it a try...?
Wouldn't that be dangerous...?

group_1.textLeft: I'd like to know how to dispose of the seeds...

group_1.textRight: Okaaay, I'll give it a try!
[surround:3033A01]Eeeh!
It broooke...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Don't you think that's too sudden?!@Is "danger" not in your vocabulary?!

group_1.textRight: Hwaaah! Did I do something bad...?

group_1.textLeft: Not really, but...it's bad for my heart...

group_1.textRight: Y-you caught me by surprise...
Well, I guess it turned out well in the end...

group_1.textLeft: That's right... It's good to know that they@can be broken.
